name: Breaking Bones (itch)
description:
This is a game made for a class, with the unique purpose of showing my skills as a Unity programmer.

You must find 7 flags to unlock a portal to escape. But if want to be remembered as a brave warrior, kill as many skeletons as you can before escape. Watch your back and don't stop shooting!

CONTROLS

  • WASD: Move
  • Spacebar: Jump
  • Mouse click: Fire
  • Mouse movement: Look around

NOTE: This is a very short time project, so you may find many bugs and glitches. 

DISCLAIMER: I don't own any of the assets included in this game, like fonts, textures, animations, sounds and music.
